subject: Your Account Has Been Locked
text:
Dear Customer,

We've detected suspicious activity in your account. Please log in immediately to verify your identity.

Click here to restore access: http://secure-verify-login.com

Thank you,
Security Team

subject: Important Notice Regarding Your Tax Return
text:
Dear Taxpayer,

We noticed discrepancies in your recent tax filing. Please review your information within 48 hours to avoid penalties.

Access your report here: http://gov-taxsecure.net

HMRC

subject: Update Your Payment Details Immediately
text:
Dear User,

Your payment method was declined. Please update your billing information to avoid service interruption.

Update Now: http://billing-update-alerts.com

Thanks,
Billing Department

subject: Claim Your Unused Rewards Now
text:
You've earned $250 in reward points, but they will expire soon!

Redeem your rewards now: http://reward-claim-center.net

Act fast!
Rewards Team

subject: Final Warning: Your Subscription Will Be Cancelled
text:
Hi there,

Your subscription is expiring. Please confirm your payment information to continue enjoying our service.

Renew now: http://subscription-secure.net

Sincerely,
Support
